summary: This is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) announcing the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein on sex trafficking charges. It congratulates the prosecution team and notes the importance of the case for providing justice for victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Arrested on sex trafficking charges; the subject of the prosecution.

events.title: Arrest of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested on sex trafficking charges and taken into custody.

events.title: Arraignment and Unsealing of Indictment
events.description: Epstein is scheduled to be presented, arraigned, and the indictment against him will be unsealed.

events.title: Press Conference Announcing Charges
events.description: A press conference is scheduled for Monday morning at 11 AM to formally announce the charges against Epstein.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested on the evening of July 6, 2019, on federal sex trafficking charges.
The indictment, to be unsealed on July 8, 2019, involves victims who were as young as 14 years old at the time of the abuse.
The prosecution is described as 'incredibly important' and targeting a 'powerful' person for 'grievous crimes.'
The email congratulates the prosecution team for their work on the case.
The document is an internal communication from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
